item.title: Deep Learning for Fully Automated Prediction of Overall Survival in Patients Undergoing Resection for Pancreatic Cancer: A Retrospective Multicenter Study
item.description: Another pancreatic cancer work milestone for our group.

item.title: 3D Graph Anatomy Geometry-Integrated Network for Pancreatic Mass Segmentation, Diagnosis, and Quantitative Patient Management
item.description: Nice work from our Intern. It the first work to propose a multiphase CT imaging analysis method for the full-spectrum taxonomy of pancreatic mass/disease diagnosis.

item.title: Deep learning for fully-automated prediction of overall survival in patients with oropharyngeal cancer using FDG PET imaging
item.description: My co-first authorship clinical paper on oncology.
